comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: If it's her: Pauline Lucille Western (1843-1877): famousamericans.net/paulinelucillewestern/

comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content:
According to author Roy MEREDITH, in his book - Mr. Lincoln's Contemporaries An Album of  Portraits by Mathew B Brady, Charles Scribner's Sons, New York, 233pgs, 1951, 1st Edition,  page 169(text) and page 172 (Image), this woman is
CLARA WALTERS
Where did Meredith get his very specific information and image? unknown
David Tooley  San Diego Civil War Roundtable
